resources.string: Look, we really need your location because of maps…
Oops - you seem to have disabled location services at the moment. This app really needs your location in order to work properly. To continue, please click on "OK".
Oops - you seem to have disabled location services at the moment. This app really needs your location in order to work properly. To continue, please click on "OK" and enable location.
You have permanently declined the location permission. Please change your permission settings.
Add your place to favourite places
You will not be on time! Quick!You must use teleportation!
Place destination can not be empty
Welcome to the Time Guide app
This short introduction will show you how to navigate through the app.
Click on toolbar items in order to access Shortest Path , Calendar and My Places Views.

This part of the app lets you freely control the map, in order to find shortest path you can either type them manually(or use google autocomplete hints) or click on your location at the top of a screen in order to fill the form automatically. Additionally when you hold your finger on the map marker will be created with te clicked position address. There will be also marker showing your current position. When you will send request both starting point and finifh point markers will be added. When you tap on the marker you can see the marker address when you click on this information the adrress will be automatically added to your favourite places
image showing layout of the maps view

At the top of a screen you can select your calendars connected to Google and our app will synchronize the events with the location so you will always be on time (dynamic notifications will make sure of that).In the middle there is calendar which you can use to navigate through the days(Android 5.0 and below may have different calendar however the features are the same). At the bottom of a screen is a list with the events fors current day which you can click on in order to access the details.
Good luck and have fun! May the time and organization be with you.

this part consists of elements resembling your saved favourite places. If you swipe down on the screen you can get the amount of time you will need in order to reach certain place from your current loaction. If you click on one of the elemts it will send you to the map with autocompleted destination so you can just search for the route :). Also if you will click on the X symbol you can delete the place, don\'t worry if you missclick it is two step process. On the bottom left there is a button that opens a dialog for creating new places.
